meta.title: TalentUp - Recruit the talents of tomorrow
meta.description: An innovative platform that connects companies to emerging talents and offers learners opportunities for professional growth.

welcome.title: Welcome to TalentUp
welcome.text: An innovative platform that connects companies to emerging talents and offers learners opportunities for professional growth.

why.title: Why TalentUp?
why.point1: Qualified candidates ready to contribute from day one.
why.point2: A community of engaged learners sharing their knowledge.
why.point3: A simplified process for recruiting or training.

companies.title: For companies
companies.heroTitle: A tailored solution for your company
companies.heroText: Recruiting an intern can be risky when a resume doesn't always reflect true skills. With TalentUp, you gain access to tested, validated talents ready to contribute from day one.

advantages.title: Benefits for your company
advantages.point3: Detailed portfolio available before the interview
advantages.point4: 6 months of intensive training ensuring skills improvement.

process.title: Simplified process
process.point1: Browse candidate portfolios directly on our platform.
process.point2: Contact us to arrange an interview and finalize your selection.

learners.title: For learners
learners.heroTitle: Learn, Share, Evolve towards an IT career!
learners.heroText: Join a community of engaged learners and access exclusive resources to grow in the IT world.

options.title: Two ways to improve your skills

option1.title: Exchange – Learn for free
option1.text: Share your tutorials, projects, or training and get free access to exclusive resources.

option2.title: Paid access – Progress at your own pace
option2.text: Access our premium trainings with no commitment.

benefits.title: A springboard towards internship and employment
benefits.point3: Create a strong portfolio visible to recruiters.

history.title: Our story
history.text: TalentUp was created in 2023 with a clear vision: to revolutionize recruitment and training in IT. We noticed a significant gap between companies' needs and candidates' actual skills. That's why we decided to create a platform that allows companies to discover truly qualified talents and learners to develop their skills in a concrete way.

value1.title: Excellence
value1.text: We are committed to maintaining a high level of standards in all our programs.

value2.title: Innovation
value2.text: We encourage innovation and constant adaptation to technological developments.

value3.title: Collaboration
value3.text: We believe that collaboration and knowledge sharing are essential to success.

csr.title: CSR Commitment
csr.text: TalentUp is committed to having a positive impact on society. We actively support digital inclusion by offering scholarships to candidates from disadvantaged backgrounds and organizing free workshops to introduce young people to coding.

form.name: Name
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

footer.description: TalentUp, the platform that connects companies to emerging talents and offers learners opportunities for professional growth.
